definition: two or more draft animals that work together to pull something, to form a cooperative unit
details:
noun
- two or more draft animals that work together to pull something
= example: two or more draft animals that work together to pull something
- a cooperative unit, especially in sports
= example: a cooperative unit, especially in sports
= synonyms: squad
verb
- to form a cooperative unit
= example: to form a cooperative unit
= synonyms: team up
